message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,600,000.  I'm confident we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price, considering your initial offer was $1,600,000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand you're looking for the best possible price. While your valuation is fair, I'm confident this product can generate significantly more value in the long run. To meet somewhere in the middle, I'm proposing $1,400,000.

Alice, I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still looking to save some money. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to pay $1,100,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price, considering the value it can bring to my business. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm not willing to go above $1,100,000.
